Hi Stella, 

Ok here are the links to the print ready artwork:

Cover: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9rhrvo8xrspilvq/Duracube-Brag-Book-Cover.pdf?dl=0
Internals: https://www.dropbox.com/s/o81273s4xy2vk9y/Duracube%20Brag%20Book%20v1.7%20-%20PRINT.pdf?dl=0

Sorry Heath, I think we're slightly confused here on projects and artwork. I think I probably replied to the wrong email sorry.

The keyring cover page is finished, that's sorted thanks.

I'm needing brag book print artwork, to the below specs. I think this link you've given us is just draft artwork. Needing final print artwork please.

(For the spine, can we fit the Duracube logo into 5mm or not exactly? + the text 'Washroom Inspiration'. If you can't fit the logo, just do 'Duracube Washroom Inspiration'. The final page in the brag book currently should be the back cover, shouldnt it? Or have we got an odd number of pages for this?

The artwork for the catalogue needs to be supplied as follows;

Cover: Front and back Cover as spread including Spine. Spine width required 5mm.

Also note: No Print in Glued area on the inside of the covers.

Artwork for pages supplied as separate pdf with 3mm Bleed. Attached more info.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Did you receive my previous email last week? I have attached the artwork again to this email. 

Did you need a back and spine as well though? If so, please let me know what you wanted included on it?

Hello Heath,

Just checking where we're up to with this? Below artwork specs from the supplier for this please. Thanks

The artwork for the catalogue needs to be supplied as follows;

Cover: Front an back Cover as spread including Spine. Spine width required 5mm. See example shown here;

Also note: No Print in Glued area on the inside of the covers.

Artwork for pages supplied as separate pdf with 3mm Bleed. Attached more info.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator

full_threads.body:
Morning Heath,

Could the attached colour chart, samples keyring cover page and below brag book please have the logo replaced to the new Registered Trademark logo, wherever it features? Then I'll need the files back again please (just the email res of brag book and colour chart, and print art file for keyring cover page).

Thanks.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
